Text:
I was a big fan of the old school Treasure Island movie.
This one stay pretty true to that, and I thought it was great.
A=10
V=10
M=9
Film is extremely boring and very extremely long.
M)8/10 I enjoyed it and even watched it a 2nd time within the week! maybe i have to much free time but none the less it wasnt bad.

One of the better filmatizations of this epic novel! Most won't like it because it's not as tight or action packed as movies have to be in order to lure in the simpler minds. But for those familiar with Stevenson's book will be happily surprised by this movie's keeping with the original story.

Great Movie for kids and adults... I have seen this 10 times plus.  Thanks for the HD version, I will be adding this one to my collection

A=10
V=10
M=10
